BBEX3.A.THB.USD.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Thailand / USD 1 = THB ... (buying)
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.
Comment on 1997: On 2 July 1997, the currency ceased to be pegged to a currency basket and a controlled floating exchange rate was adopted.
Comment on 1998: In 1997/1998 financial crises in some south-east Asian countries.
